title: Here is a list of 20 articles up to 2020 that focus on methods for simultaneous translation

container-title: **"Simultaneous Translation with Neural Machine Translation"** by Baidu Research

title: **"Simultaneous Neural Machine Translation Using Anticipation and Controllable Latency"** by Ma et al
**"Wait-k Strategy for Simultaneous Machine Translation"** by Ma et al
**"Real-Time Neural Machine Translation for Live Speech"** by Waibel et al
**"Simultaneous Translation with Incremental NMT"** by Arivazhagan et al
**"Simultaneous Speech Translation Using Augmented Models"** by Di Gangi et al
**"End-to-End Simultaneous Speech Translation"** by Ren et al

container-title: **"Learning to Translate in Real-Time with Neural Machine Translation"** by Dalvi et al

title: **"Simultaneous Translation with Flexible Policy via Restricted Imitation Learning"** by Zheng et al
**"Simultaneous Machine Translation with Monotonic Attention"** by Raffel et al
**"Monotonic Infinite Lookback Attention for Simultaneous Machine Translation"** by Arivazhagan et al
**"Simultaneous Translation by Streaming End-to-End ASR"** by Di Gangi et al
**"Adaptive Simultaneous Translation by Incorporating Pseudo-References"** by Zheng et al

container-title: **"Simultaneous Neural Machine Translation with Connectionist Temporal Classification"** by Ren et al

title: **"Simultaneous Speech Translation with Transformer"** by Di Gangi et al
**"Simultaneous Translation with Dynamic Policy"** by Arivazhagan et al
**"Simultaneous Speech Translation with Self-Attention Models"** by Sperber et al
**"Simultaneous Translation with Segment-to-Segment Neural Transduction"** by Cho et al
**"Simultaneous Speech Translation with Transformer and Monotonic Multihead Attention"** by Ma et al
**"Simultaneous Speech Translation with Online Transformer"** by Di Gangi et al
These articles cover a range of methodologies and advancements in the field of simultaneous translation, particularly focusing on neural machine translation and speech translation technologies
